<title level="1" right="Rules">[Affixing a Talisman](/Rules.aspx?ID=3204)</title>

**Source** [GM Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=218) pg. 263 <sup>2.0</sup>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">
Each talisman’s stat block indicates the type of item it can be affixed to. Affixing or removing a talisman requires using the [Affix a Talisman](/Actions.aspx?ID=2632) activity. A single talisman can be affixed to only one item at a time, and an item can have only one talisman affixed to it at a time without suppressing them all.
</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
